titles.title: JP232 Thank You, Lord, for this fine day (altd)

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Thank You, Lord, for this fine day,
Thank You, Lord, for this fine day,
Thank You, Lord, for this fine day,
Right where we are.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Thank You, Lord, for bread and fish
Thank You, Lord, for bread and fish
Thank You, Lord, for bread and fish
Right where we are.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Thank You, Lord, for loving us,
Thank You, Lord, for loving us,
Thank You, Lord, for loving us,
Right where we are.

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Alleluia, praise the Lord!
Alleluia, praise the Lord!
Alleluia, praise the Lord,
Right where we are.
